title: Executive Function Coaching
shortDescription: Develops planning, organization, time management, and self-regulation skills.
description: Executive function coaching helps individuals with autism develop the cognitive skills needed for planning, organization, time management, task initiation, and self-regulation. Many people with autism struggle with executive function despite having strong abilities in other areas. Coaches work one-on-one to build practical systems and strategies for managing daily responsibilities, schoolwork, and eventually workplace demands.
benefits: Creates sustainable systems for daily life
whoCanBenefit: Students struggling with homework and projects
Teens preparing for college or work
Those who struggle to start or finish tasks

links.label: CHADD (Children and Adults with ADHD)
links.description: Resources on executive function (often co-occurring with autism)
